data.actual_result: The client will instantly crash if you even try to view the ping when the server is on outage
data.expected_result: Not crash and possibly hide the mention since the server is on outage where the ping originates from
data.short_description: If a server is on outage and you try to access recent mentions if you been mentioned in that server, the client will instantly crash upon trying to load the mention
data.steps_to_repro: - Get mentioned in a server - Somehow get that server go on outage - Try to access recent mentions tab (where the mention would show up and the affected server)
